about_the_game:
American Commando is a fusion of Duke’s humor, Wolfenstein’s weird war aesthetics and insane blitzkrieg-style gameplay. Become a American commando and change the course of the War!



Main game features:
- Enjoy the 90s style FPS, with pixels that we all love :D
- Kill as many Nazi soldiers as you can using a traditional WWII weapons or Wunderwaffe prototypes!
- Explore famous Nazi locations like project Riese, U-Boat shipyard or Hitler's masion, and many more!
- Discover Wunderwaffe secrets, new technologies, and stop Nazis from building an atomic bomb!



Disclaimer:
American Commando is a humores FPS retro game. In this project players WILL NOT see a realistic violence or drastic WWII scenes like Nazi work camps, executions, experiments on people, or getting advantage of the minorities. We are NOT using swastikas, SS or any of the Nazi propaganda symbols.

content_descriptors.notes: Pixel violence and blood. No nudity, no sexual acts.

detailed_description:
American Commando is a fusion of Duke’s humor, Wolfenstein’s weird war aesthetics and insane blitzkrieg-style gameplay. Become a American commando and change the course of the War!



Main game features:
- Enjoy the 90s style FPS, with pixels that we all love :D
- Kill as many Nazi soldiers as you can using a traditional WWII weapons or Wunderwaffe prototypes!
- Explore famous Nazi locations like project Riese, U-Boat shipyard or Hitler's masion, and many more!
- Discover Wunderwaffe secrets, new technologies, and stop Nazis from building an atomic bomb!



Disclaimer:
American Commando is a humores FPS retro game. In this project players WILL NOT see a realistic violence or drastic WWII scenes like Nazi work camps, executions, experiments on people, or getting advantage of the minorities. We are NOT using swastikas, SS or any of the Nazi propaganda symbols.

name: American Commando Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 1GB (720p Low), GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB (1080p Low) or AMD equivalents
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB (1080p High), GeForce GTX 1070 8GB (1080p Extreme) or AMD equivalents
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: American Commando is a retro 3D first-person shooter set in an alternative history of the 2nd World War. Kill hordes of Nazis, explore the mysteries of the Wunderwaffe, unveil the sinister truth behind top secret projects and... bring back 1000 Nazi scalps!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
